name: Kitten Evolution: Meow Clicker
description:
Become a witness of a real evolution from small kitten to a big cat! You are the one who will take part in evolution of cats. In this meow clicker simulator, you will see the evolution of cats. Show everyone that it takes little effort for you to create a cat of luxury breed without any mutations. In the beginning, you will have a usual cat of no breed make him come through the evolution. Evolve your kitten and evade mutations to create a beautiful cat of luxury breed in our meow clicker simulator. Become the proud owner of cats and kittens and learn all mysteries of meow evolution. Just evolve your cats of usual breed and hear pretty meow a new kitten, of more luxury breed. Evolve until you will have the most luxurious cat. How many kittens can evolve without mutations? Start your way to a status of the honorable owner of kittens in our new meow clicker simulator: Kitten Evolution: Meow Clicker.

In this meow clicker simulator, you will have to come through evolution of kittens and evade awful mutations. Each ten seconds a usual kitten of no breed will be dropped to you and it will say meow. Merge two cats of the same breed and evolve them into the next one. You can use power ups to reduce time of dropping or to increase the income. You can also buy needed cats and use them to spend less time waiting for dropping enough usual cats. Share this meow clicker game with your friends and come through the evolution of cats. Find out whose kittens will have no mutations at all. Use everything we give you to evolve your pets from simple kittens to beautiful cats of luxury breed.

Kitten Evolution: Meow Clicker is a free to play meow clicker simulator of cats’ evolution. Open our meow clicker simulator to evolve your kittens into cats of luxury breed. Merge two cats of the same breed to see evolution of cats and hear meow of a new one. Use power ups and cats from our meow store to speed up the process of evolution. Become the most proud owner in this meow clicker simulator. Call your friends to have fun together, let your cats come through evolution and find out who will have the most luxurious cat in. How many of your kittens will have mutations? We do not know. So download our application and evade those mutations. Have fun with your kittens.
